successes.title: Mycestro™, The Next Generation 3D Mouse
successes.description: Mycestro™ is a 3D mouse that fits on the index finger and allows you to control your computer with hand gestures and mouse functions.

Pledges.description: Thanks for your support – we know every dollar counts. To show our appreciation, you will be listed as an honorary backer on our website. You will also receive advance notice and updated information on Mycestro’s availability, as well as progress reports throughout the project.

By pledging $25 or more, you will receive a commemorative Mycestro™ Conduct Your World™ T-shirt and a listing as a Bronze status backer on our website. You will also receive advance notice and updated information on Mycestro’s availability, as well as progress reports throughout the project. Free shipping in the U.S.

You’ll receive one Mycestro™ in classic white, a commemorative Mycestro Conduct Your World™ T-shirt and a listing as a Silver status backer on our website. You’ll also receive advance notice and updated information on Mycestro’s availability, as well as progress reports throughout the project. Free shipping in the U.S.

One Mycestro™ (LEFT HAND) -You’ll receive one Mycestro™ in classic white, a commemorative Mycestro Conduct Your World™ T-shirt and a listing as a Silver status backer on our website. You’ll also receive advance notice and updated information on Mycestro’s availability, as well as progress reports throughout the project. Free shipping in the U.S.

You’ll receive one Mycestro™ in your choice of colors – cyan, magenta, yellow or black, a commemorative Mycestro Conduct Your World™ T-shirt and a listing as a Gold status backer on our website. You will also receive advance notice and updated information on Mycestro’s availability, as well as progress reports throughout the project. Free shipping in the U.S.

One Mycestro™  (LEFT HAND) - You’ll receive one Mycestro™ in your choice of colors – cyan, magenta, yellow or black, a commemorative Mycestro Conduct Your World™ T-shirt and a listing as a Gold status backer on our website. You will also receive advance notice and updated information on Mycestro’s availability, as well as progress reports throughout the project. Free shipping in the U.S.

Two Mycestro™ MULTI PACK (RIGHT HAND) - You’ll receive two right hand Mycestro™ in classic white with a single dongle, a commemorative Mycestro Conduct Your World™ T-shirt and a listing as a Multi-Silver status backer on our website. You’ll also receive advance notice and updated information on Mycestro’s availability, as well as progress reports throughout the project. Free shipping in the U.S.

Two Mycestro™ MULTI PACK (LEFT HAND) - You’ll receive two left hand Mycestro™ in classic white with a single dongle, a commemorative Mycestro Conduct Your World™ T-shirt and a listing as a Multi-Silver status backer on our website. You’ll also receive advance notice and updated information on Mycestro’s availability, as well as progress reports throughout the project. Free shipping in the U.S.

Two Mycestro™ COMBO PACK (RIGHT & LEFT HAND) - You’ll receive one right hand and one left hand Mycestro™ in classic white with a single dongle, a commemorative Mycestro Conduct Your World™ T-shirt and a listing as a Combo-Silver status backer on our website. You’ll also receive advance notice and updated information on Mycestro’s availability, as well as progress reports throughout the project. Free shipping in the U.S.

Two Mycestro™ MULTI PACK (RIGHT HAND) - You’ll receive two right hand Mycestro™ in your choice of colors – cyan, magenta, yellow or black with a single dongle, a commemorative Mycestro Conduct Your World™ T-shirt and a listing as a Multi-Gold status backer on our website. You will also receive advance notice and updated information on Mycestro’s availability, as well as progress reports throughout the project. Free shipping in the U.S.

Two Mycestro™ MULTI PACK (LEFT HAND) - You’ll receive two left hand Mycestro™ in your choice of colors – cyan, magenta, yellow or black with a single dongle, a commemorative Mycestro Conduct Your World™ T-shirt and a listing as a Multi-Gold status backer on our website. You will also receive advance notice and updated information on Mycestro’s availability, as well as progress reports throughout the project. Free shipping in the U.S.

Two Mycestro™ COMBO PACK (RIGHT & LEFT HAND) - You’ll receive one right hand and one left hand Mycestro™ in your choice of colors – cyan, magenta, yellow or black with a single dongle, a commemorative Mycestro Conduct Your World™ T-shirt and a listing as a Combo-Gold status backer on our website. You will also receive advance notice and updated information on Mycestro’s availability, as well as progress reports throughout the project. Free shipping in the U.S.
